timeline.bodyText:
I think I have a fix here: https://github.com/aws/aws-greengrass-kernel/pull/175/files#diff-ed690837067a5ad8d1e95dbc8da15ae8R287
Making it return true will use break in the state machine. That way the state machine will wait for the next event instead of spinning here.
